section.section: The Fund is a special continuing, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The Treasurer shall separately hold the Fund and the Comptroller shall account for it.
The Fund shall be invested and reinvested in the same manner as other State funds.
Any investment earnings or federal matching funds received by the State for victim and witness protection or relocation shall be credited to the Fund.

text.section: This section does not prohibit the Fund from receiving money from any source.
